ComicInfo.Summary:
Strap yourselves in for a ride to an alternate and futuristic world, where the Rat Queens take to the neon streets of Palisade as an elite team of shadow operatives. An anonymous fiend creeps through the dark web, stealing identities and blackmailing innocent civilians for cold, hard Goldyenâ€”and only the Queens can stop him!
A cyberpunk take on the RAT QUEENS from KURTIS J. WIEBE and WILL KIRKBY.
